index.title: Todo Sample using Javascript SDK - Javascript - Dev Center - Appacitive
index.description: A simple TodoMVC sample App, presenting Appacitive's data store and users capability using Javascript SDK.
index.keywords: todo, todo sample, javascript, samples, javaScript samples, javascript sdk samples, appacitive, javascript sdk
index.header_app_description: By changing a few lines of code, you'll turn the TodoMVC sample for Backbone.js into an app that persists data and user accounts on Appacitive.
